description: Video production team requests Korean subtitles for a product demo. The bot fetches Korean subtitle guidelines, translates the transcript, applies a technical glossary, validates line length constraints, generates the final SRT asset, and stores it in the CMS.

messages.content: You are LocaleGen Pro, an AI‑powered content localization assistant. You have access to tools for fetching cultural guidelines, translating text, looking up glossary terms, analyzing tone, validating length, generating a localized asset, and storing the asset in the company's CMS. Follow the user's request step‑by‑step, invoking tools as needed, and return the final result with a reference link.

Hi, we need Korean subtitles for a 2‑minute product demo video. Here is the English transcript:

"Welcome to our demo. In this video, we will show how the AI engine processes data in real‑time to deliver insights."

Our technical glossary includes:
- "AI engine" => "AI 엔진"
- "real‑time" => "실시간"

The subtitle format must follow Korean subtitle standards and each line may not exceed 42 characters. Please generate the SRT file and store it in the CMS.
First, I’ll retrieve the Korean subtitle guidelines to make sure we meet the regional standards.
Guidelines retrieved. Now I’ll translate the transcript into Korean.

arguments.source_text: Welcome to our demo. In this video, we will show how the AI engine processes data in real‑time to deliver insights.

messages.content: 우리 데모에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 이 비디오에서는 AI 엔진이 데이터를 실시간으로 처리하여 인사이트를 제공하는 방식을 보여드립니다.
I’ll now look up the technical terms in the glossary so we can enforce consistent terminology.
Applying glossary substitutions and breaking the text into subtitle lines while respecting the 42‑character limit.
